text: Znaur Nikolaevich Gassiev ( Znauyr Gassity, , ; 17 March 1925 - 6 March 2016) Leaders of South Ossetia was a South Ossetian politician. He was one of the leaders of the South Ossetian independence movement in the early 1990s. He served as the first President of South Ossetia from 1991 through 1992. Gassiev died on 6 March 2016 in Tskhinvali. He was aged 90. ==References== Category:1925 births Category:2016 deaths Category:Politicians from Georgia (country) Category:Presidents of South Ossetia Category:Soviet military personnel of World War II Category:Teachers
title: Znaur Gassiev
